sentences.en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

sentences.en: A valid legislative rule conclusively settles the matters it addresses, at least at the administrative level.
sentences.cn: 有效的立法规则结论性地解决它所论及的事宜, 至少在行政一级如此.

sentences.en: For renal disease, an etiologic relationship has not been established conclusively.
sentences.cn: 对于肾脏疾病, 却仍不能做出病因关系的结论.

sentences.en: It conclusively appeared in the final cut as a post - credits scene.
sentences.cn: 这场戏确实作为字幕之后的最后一场戏出现在了电影的最后一幕.

sentences.en: It could all be explained quite simply and conclusively by accepting the existence of atoms.
sentences.cn: 只要承认有原子存在,所有问题都能简单、彻底的得到解释.

sentences.en: Newtow conclusively established the law of gravity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿确定了万有引力定律.

sentences.en: No human tumor has yet been conclusively shown to be viral in origin.
sentences.cn: 至今尚不能下结论说有些人类的肿瘤是由病毒所引起的.

sentences.en: Recent work has shown conclusively that the epicuticle is discontinuous.
sentences.cn: 最近研究工作已总结性地表明表皮层薄膜并不是连续的.

sentences.en: She said if the world did not act conclusively now, it would only bequeath the problem to future generations.
sentences.cn: 她说如果人类现在不采取决定性的行动，那就只会把问题留给子孙后代。

sentences.en: The efficacy of this intervention has not been determined conclusively.
sentences.cn: 这种干预的功效尚未最后确定.

sentences.en: The problem was finally, though not conclusively, identified as a severely pinched nerve.
sentences.cn: 问题终于被认定为是神经受到严重挤压，尽管这还不是最终结论。

sentences.en: The true purpose of Machu Picchu has never been conclusively determined.
sentences.cn: 但马丘比丘的真正用途仍不能确定.

sentences.en: They supposed that their theories could explain conclusively the many natural phenomena.
sentences.cn: 他们以为他们的理论可对许多自然现象作结论性的解释.

sentences.en: To decide or settle ( a dispute, for example ) conclusively and authoritatively.
sentences.cn: 判定结论性、权威性地决定或解决 ( 纠纷等 )
我们最终解决了那个问题.

words.tran_cn: 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的
